ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client has hypersensitivity to any of the vaccine components"Potential contraindications" = "Hypersensitivity to vaccine components""Potential contraindications" = "Hypersensitivity to vaccine components" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Malariacontraindications * Tabs: Malaria
Malaria vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Malariacontraindications * Tabs: Malaria
Do not vaccinate client with RTS,S/AS01 vaccine if client has severe hypersensitivity to any of the vaccine components.Do not vaccinate client with RTS,S/AS01 vaccine if client has severe hypersensitivity to any of the vaccine components.Do not vaccinate client with RTS,S/AS01 vaccine if client has severe hypersensitivity to any of the vaccine components.
